scripts.import-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.heroku-prebuild: rm -rf $(npm config get cache); mv ../.npmcache $(npm config get cache) || echo No cache
scripts.heroku-postbuild: rm -rf ../.npmcache; mv $(npm config get cache) ../.npmcache || echo No cache && NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
